column18: 08/28/2014: An explosives-laden vehicle detonated in Vlore city, Vlore county, Albania. One person was killed and two others were wounded in the blast. No group claimed responsibility for the incident.
column97: A remote-triggered explosive laden SUV was used in the attack.
column108: A vehicle was damaged in this attack.
